answerText: fulgurites[10] Fulgurites lack long-range order, making them amorphous solids instead of this type of solid. These solids have atoms or molecules arranged in a regular periodic lattice, though they may have defects that interrupt the regular structure.

subject: Science
question: Question:  [10] Name these glass tubes formed when lightning hits sand or soil.
